title: Drawing, "Battle Scene"
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: One of a three part drawing.  Drawing of a battle with soldiers on horse and foot.  Drawing to the far right is 1901-39-2798.  At right a drawing of a mounted soldier, about to swing a sword.  At left soldiers attack the rider with spears.  Below them two is a man laying on the floor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Battle Scene".
Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2798.
